N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 489.5 - Inspection and enforcement

State Regulations
(a) Inspection. (1)

Responsibility
for the inspection and supervision of family-type homes has been delegated by
the commissioner to the commissioners of local social services districts in
which the family-type home for adults is located. (2)

Unless otherwise specified, the
definitions and procedures set forth in sections
486.1
and
486.2
of this Title must apply. A
complete unannounced inspection of each certified family-type home must be
conducted at least annually. Additional inspections must be conducted by the
social services district when necessary to ensure the health, safety and
well-being of the residents. (3)

The local department shall notify the appropriate regional office of the
department of any uncertified homes which reasonably appear to be family-type
homes for adults and shall, upon the request of the department, inspect any
such homes. (b) Enforcement. At the request of the department, the local district shall
participate in hearings or other enforcement related
activities. Notes
